message: Let's split close to even, but slightly in my favor since the money devalues faster for you.
Your turn Alice.  I believe a fair 50/50 split is the most sensible option.
The value decreases faster for you Bob, so I'm proposing a slightly better split for me than last time.
Alice, it's clear we both want a larger share, but time is costing us both. I'm proposing a compromise to settle this before inflation hurts me further.
